departments.name: Creative Designer
recommended_job_responsibilities: Develop and maintain visual identity, including logos and branding.
Implement design standards and guidelines for visual content.
Collaborate with Marketing teams for consistent branding.
Create visual assets for website, social media, and campaigns.
Conduct market research to stay updated on industry trends.
Provide training and support on design software and techniques.
Manage and prioritize multiple projects for timely delivery.

departments.name: Head of Regional Sales
recommended_job_responsibilities: Lead and manage regional sales teams to achieve targets.
Develop sales strategies for revenue and profitability.
Conduct market research to identify growth opportunities.
Collaborate with category teams for aligned strategies.
Manage relationships with key partners and stakeholders.
Analyze sales data for performance improvement.
Provide training to enhance sales teams' skills.

departments.name: Sales Admin
recommended_job_responsibilities: Manage and coordinate administrative tasks for sales.
Ensure accurate and timely onboarding of merchant partners.
Provide support and training to improve sales experience.
Maintain accurate records of sales data and performance.
Assist in developing and implementing sales processes.
Provide administrative support to other teams as needed.

departments.name: Sales Digital
recommended_job_responsibilities: Develop and implement digital marketing strategies.
Optimize website content, SEO, and ads for improved performance.
Analyze and report on website and social media metrics.
Collaborate with other teams for consistent branding.
Stay updated on industry trends in digital marketing.
Provide training and support on digital marketing tools.

departments.name: Sales Trainer
recommended_job_responsibilities: Develop and implement training programs for sales teams.
Conduct training sessions to improve performance and customer service.
Collaborate with other teams for consistent messaging and branding.
Evaluate and improve training processes and materials.
Provide coaching and support to enhance sales teams' performance.
Analyze sales data for insights to improve strategies.

recommendation: Platform Designer: Ensure a cohesive modern aesthetic and clean look/feel in all design elements affecting our products while ensuring their brand attributes are consistently represented.
Platform Engineer: Design and develop user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.
Product Manager: Acts as the subject matter expert of the product and gather user/customers feedback to deeply understand their needs.
Researcher: Observe and analyze user behavior to provide actionable insights to help develop Blibli's customer experience.

UX Researcher: Conduct generative and foundational user research that will serve as the basis for new ideas and concepts, product roadmap, discovery, and initiative backlog to develop product and feature improvements.
